thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1748
thread.title: Kar Hui

author: Kar Hui
title: Kar Hui
text: I first saw the offer for a heavily discounted flight from my city to New York based on an aesthetically pleasing advertisement on a site I was browsing. After inputting my flight dates, the "Flexible dates" window pane popped up prompting me to look for even cheaper alternatives! It was a great experience -- easy user interface, intuitive site to use, and the prices were hard to beat compared to alternative websites! Great experience.
